title: Researchers overcome hurdle in CRISPR gene editing for muscular dystrophy

title_detail.value: Researchers overcome hurdle in CRISPR gene editing for muscular dystrophy

summary: The gene editing technique known as CRISPR is a revolutionary approach to treating inherited diseases. However, the tool has yet to be used to effectively treat long-term, chronic conditions. A research team has identified and overcome a barrier in CRISPR gene editing that may lay the foundation for sustained treatments using the technique.
